title: Maui Lane Care Home: refresh logo + favicon assets and wire into UI

requirements.summary: Generate and add the updated Maui Lane Care Home brand logo as a static frontend asset for header use.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file is generated in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filename and dimensions from imageRequirements.edits

file_operations.description: Add the refreshed Maui Lane Care Home logo (512x512) as a static asset for use in the authenticated app header.

requirements.summary: Generate and add the updated Maui Lane Care Home application icon as a static frontend asset for favicon use.
acceptanceCriteria: A new app icon image file is generated in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filename and dimensions from imageRequirements.edits

file_operations.description: Add the refreshed Maui Lane Care Home app icon (256x256) as a static asset suitable for use as the browser favicon.

requirements.summary: Update the authenticated app header to display the newly generated Maui Lane Care Home logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, the MauiAppShell header displays the updated logo image
The header logo image has meaningful alt text in English (keep as "Maui Lane Care Home")

file_operations.description: Update the header logo image source to use frontend/public/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png while keeping alt text exactly "Maui Lane Care Home".

requirements.summary: Update the site favicon reference to use the newly generated Maui Lane Care Home app icon asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The favicon <link> in frontend/index.html points to the updated icon asset
Reloading the app shows the updated favicon in the browser tab

file_operations.description: Update the favicon link to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon-v2.dim_256x256.png.
